name: Worm Adventure 4: Into the Wormhole
description:
Worm Adventure 4: Into the Wormhole is a precision 3D platformer with a simple but expressive moveset. Jump off of walls, swing from floating rocks, or pull yourself over ledges that are just out of reach. By using your tools in creative ways, you can overcome almost any obstacle.



  • Climb back to the top of the cave and beyond?
  • Fall. A lot.
  • Play alongside your friends or strangers with online multiplayer
  • Develop a satisfying mastery of the controls.
  • Find skips and shortcuts to recover your progress faster.
  • Play over 40 arcade mode levels.
